result.execSummary:
The defendant Demetrius Michael Hoglund was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Demetrius Michael Hoglund is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Demetrius Michael Hoglund was found guilty of Battery [Modifiers: Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Court suspends court costs and DNA surcharge.

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, ADA: Michael Edward Nieskes, DF ATTY: Alex Stormont, DF: Demetrius Michael Hoglund appeared from jail.  Court called.  Includes case 14CT187, 14CT283, 14TR704, 15CF289, 16CF500, 16CF501, 16CF512 & 16CF541.  DE files a Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights Form.  Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads Guilty to Ct 1 in 16CF512.  Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds the DE adjudicated guilty of Ct 1 in 16CF512. On motion of the State without objecton, Crt dismisses Ct 2 in 16CF512.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty.  DE pleads Guilty to Ct 1 in 15CF289.  Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds the DE adjudicated guilty of Ct 1 in 15CF289. On motion of the State without objecton, Crt dismisses Ct 2, Ct 3 & Ct 4 in 15CF289.  Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads Guilty to Ct 4 in 16CF501 without the domestic abuse enhancer in 16CF501.  Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds the DE adjudicated guilty of Ct 4 with out the domestic abuse enhancer in 16CF501. On motion of the State without objecton, Crt dismisses Ct 1, Ct 2, Ct 3 in 16CF501.   On motion of the State without objecton, Crt reads in for purposes of restitution and dismisses 16CF541.   On motion of the State without objecton, Crt dismisses 14CT187, 14CT283, 14TR704 & 16CF500.  Sentencing arguments. Crt orders:

Ct. 1 in 16CF512 to run concurrent to Polk County Case 14CF378
- DE sentenced to 2 years I/C and 1 year E/S 
- Credit for 48 days served
- DE ordered to pay $695.99 restitution to the St. Croix County Sheriff's Department and court costs of $268.00 and $250.00 for the DNA surcharge to be paid out of prison wages
- Remaining balance of costs and restitution to be paid during E/S
- DE to provide the St. Croix County Jail with a DNA sample
- 20 days to appeal

Ct. 1 in 15CF289 to run concurrent to Polk County Case 14CF378
- DE sentence to 9 months in the St. Croix County Jail with credit for 29 days time served
- Court suspends costs and the DNA surcharge
- 20 days to appeal

Ct 4 in 16CF501 without the Domestic Abuse Enhancer to run concurrent to Polk County Case 14CF378
- DE sentenced to 90 days in the St. Croix County Jail with credit for 56 days served
- Court suspends costs and the DNA surcharge
- 20 days to appeal

DE is remanded to the custody of the St. Croix County Sheriff's Department for transportation to Polk County

CO: Lundell, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: Webb, DA: Michael Nieskes, DF ATTY: Alex Stormont, DF: Demetrius Michael Hoglund appeared from jail.  Court called.  Includes case 16CF541 (preliminary hearing) & 14CT187, 14CT283, 14TR704, 15CF289, 16CF500, 16CF501 & 16CF512 (Set for STC/PTC).  Court proceeds with the preliminary hearing on 16CF541.  DE files with the court the Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver. Court questions the DE.  Court finds that the DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives right to a preliminary hearing.  Court finds probable cause that a felony was probably committed and probable cause that the DE probably committed one and binds the DE over for trial.  DE has been sentenced in Polk County with an I/C of 10 years.  Bail is continued.  Court adjourned.  lw  Court recalled.  Includes case 16CF541 (Arraignment) & 14CT187, 14CT283, 14TR704, 15CF289, 16CF500, 16CF501 & 16CF512 (Set for STC/PTC).  Court proceeds with the arraignment on 16CF541.  Court informs Def of charges, possible penalties and rights.  Defendant understands.  DE pleads Not Guilty on all counts.  Set out for Plea/Sentencing on all files.  Attorney Stormont argues bond.  State does not object.  Court modifies the bond.  DE is to remain at the St. Croix County Jail until after the Plea/Sentencing hearing at January 12, 2017.  Bail is continued as modified.  Court adjourned.  lw  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 12, 2017 at 01:00 pm.

*AMENDED*
Includes case 16CF541, 14CT187, 14CT283, 14TR704, 15CF289, 16CF500, 16CF501 & 16CF512   

I  It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, A. Richie.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ordered that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis Stats.

*AMENDED*

It is a signature bond to be Co-signed by Mother, SURETY NAME: Laura Hoglund who guarantees compliance with the terms of this bond by pledging $2,000.00 and understands that if the defendant does not comply with the terms of this bond, the bond will be forfeited and the defendant and/or surety may be ordered to pay the amount of the bond.

-Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia.

-It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations,  Kedrick H.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.


SURETY NAME/S: ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.
